content: cozy and cute these adorable fox socks are the perfect reading socks for those cold fall & winter days my children love the playful design and thick warm feel of these socks it s like wrapping their little feet in a huge from mom the pattern makes itty bitty baby sizes all the way up to adult mens and women s sizes so the whole family can match in these stripes sock slippers this season i ve written a few crochet sock patterns but this is the first with full details on the striped design and an hd video tutorial please note that this is an ad-free detailed pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free on https //www lakesideloops com/flynn/ in an effort to make our pattern as convenient and easy to read as possible the pattern includes **written pattern** **pictures** **video tutorial** left hand pattern available upon request *all patterns and photographs are the property of lakeside loops©* **all finished products from our patterns may be used for local sales and sold online ** thank you for looking kind wishes lakeside loops www lakesideloops com
